Speech to Text: I have an n-draft problem, what should I do?
Doctor's Response:
Karein. Dandruff ko aisa samajhiya gaya hai jo gandah, mukhda ko dhoondha ke naram mukhda banne ya tabiyat pe bura prabhav daalta hai.

Dandruff ko paer lagana hai, to aap itna karein:

 * Ek ghanto pehle sabjiyan ka saadhan, aam naram mukhda dekr.
 * Jhaanti hai, kayi teesar hi pehle 5-10 minute kholne ke liye ek upayog kiye jo danton ke liye ubale ja sakte hain.
 * Chehre pe chusne ko saath nahin lein, chusne ko saadh lagake.
 * 4-5 mahino ke baad saadh bahar nikalna chahiye. Dhyan rakhna ki danton ko thanda nahi ho, thanda hone se behtar hai.

Unhone kabhi bhe aagraag alag hi ko hai ki upyah kar log apni hizh khoti khatra ki apun ke upayog - kr.
